insert into vod_tv_albuminfo_recommend (id,seriesCode,status, sequence, pictureurl1,seriesName, pictureurl2,description,score,viewPoint, duration,corner,cornerimg,isvip,epis,volumncount,currentnum ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seriesCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureurl1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seriesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureurl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cornerimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvip,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{epis,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{volumncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into vod_tv_channel (id, channelName,channelCode,levels,sequence , parentCode, status, navigationtype,count, type,labels, img,isshow_img,isshow_right,isshow_left ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levels,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{navigationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{labels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isshow_img,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_right,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isshow_left,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into vod_tv_special (id, name ,imgurl ,backgroundimg,viewPoint,describes, status ,sequence ,web_url ,type,template, create_time , create_user,textcolor
) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backgroundimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{web_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{template,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{create_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{textcolor,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

update vod_tv_albuminfo_recommend
status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pictureurl1=#{pictureurl1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seriesName=#{seriesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pictureurl2=#{pictureurl2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description=#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

epis=#{epis,jdbcType=INTEGER},

currentnum=#{currentnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where seriesCode=#{seriesCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
